item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Chimaera God:

Ocarina of Time is easier than TP in my opinion. But in a;; tha Zelda games, has anyone realized that the dugeon bosses are easier to beat than the dungeons themselves. Dungeon bosses should always be stronger than the dungeons that they dwell in.

yea i was wondering why it took me like 5 minutes to beat a boss…

Read full topic

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

I played it the day it came out… pretty much the farthest I’ve gotten on a Zelda game too lol

[quote=“Lin, post:9, topic:145261”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=198974.msg1776421#msg1776421 date=1190588751]
Ocarina of Time is easier than TP in my opinion. But in a;; tha Zelda games, has anyone realized that the dugeon bosses are easier to beat than the dungeons themselves. Dungeon bosses should always be stronger than the dungeons that they dwell in.
[/quote]Zelda OoT was the best, I remember beating it when I was 6 or so, with my cousin. I was always afraid of the hands in the Forest Temple after I first did it. Aaah, now I got the ROM and I hack it ^.^

Also, bosses are sometimes harder than the dungeon, like uuuuh… Nvm, can’t think of one =P[/quote]

DL’d it for virtual console, wish I’d gotten it for N64 when I had the chance…

Read full topic

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:8, topic:145261”]Ocarina of Time is easier than TP in my opinion. But in a;; tha Zelda games, has anyone realized that the dugeon bosses are easier to beat than the dungeons themselves. Dungeon bosses should always be stronger than the dungeons that they dwell in.[/quote]Zelda OoT was the best, I remember beating it when I was 6 or so, with my cousin. I was always afraid of the hands in the Forest Temple after I first did it. Aaah, now I got the ROM and I hack it ^.^

Also, bosses are sometimes harder than the dungeon, like uuuuh… Nvm, can’t think of one =P

Read full topic

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @Jumping_Cow Jumping Cow
item.description:

I seriously loved Zelda, ive played it since like ever. I havent beaten this game yet but i hope to soon. I just fell in love with it! it is the best.

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @Smezy Smezy
item.description:
@Smezy wrote:

The game could be tricky, Or confusing either way. but it is fun, and isn’t like Zelda and the Orcarina of time.

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

yea i love this game i beat half of it then stopped because school started and i didnt get much time to beat it. Im pretty close to the end though. Anyways i beat the first zelda game when i was like 5 or 6 the ocarina of time pwns you all lol. Anyways they came out with alot of other zelda games i had no idea about. So i have to go buy them and beat them all.

Read full topic

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:3, topic:145261”]I know what place you’re talking about. You stopped at the Arbiter’s Grounds. That temple is that hard, it’s just really repetitive. As for my self, I’ve already beaten the game, but I decided to play again so I could get all of the extra stuff like the golden bugs and items of such.[/quote]I didn’t even try it. I walked in and stopped playing for a year this January.

Read full topic

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

I know what place you’re talking about. You stopped at the Arbiter’s Grounds. That temple is that hard, it’s just really repetitive. As for my self, I’ve already beaten the game, but I decided to play again so I could get all of the extra stuff like the golden bugs and items of such.

Read full topic

I used to have no life with that game. I love it, and I never really did beat it. I stopped at the A_ something Grounds, the Sand Place for some reason.
